channel.title: Tokyo on Harecoded
channel.description: Recent content in Tokyo on Harecoded

item.title: non-RDBM distributed databases, map/reduce, key/value and cloud computing
item.description: I've been playing recently with several distributed databases with the aim of choosing the best solution for my needs. Since there isn't much documentation on the web with a general overview on the subject, I write here some comments, thoughts and my humble experience. Hope it's usefull for you, this document is not a comparison of performance, or a "mine is bigger than yours",  just some ideas ;) My background
